paper_keywords: fuzzifying topological vector spaces on CDL
paper_abstract: In this paper, we introduce a notion of fuzzifying topological vector spaces on completely distributive lattices, and study some of their basic properties. We also obtain a necessary and sufficient condition for an L-fuzzifying neighborhood structure, in a vector space X, to be an L-fuzzifying neighborhood structure of zero for a fuzzifying vector topology. Finally, we prove that the category of fuzzifying topological vector spaces on completely distributive lattices is topological over the category of vector spaces.
paper_title: Fuzzifying topological vector spaces on completely distributive lattices
